name: OpenGL Tennis
description:
An up to 2 player tennis game made in early 2018 using OpenGL.

Read about it Here

Controls:

Menu Select
Enter
Menu Scroll
Arrow Keys
MoveWASDMove (Player 2)
Arrow KeysChange AI type.
1, 2, 3 (while in game)
Return to menu
Esc

AI types:

  1. Simple follows ball
  2. Advanced (Broken in current build)
  3. Predictive 

Physics is tied to frame rate because if Bethesda can get away with it I can ;)
